OrgName.entry: TOBACCO PIPE MAKERS AND TOBACCO TRADE BENEVOLENT FUND

Desc.entry: A registered charity that can offer allowances to supplement state benefits, grants to help with holidays or unexpected expenses, and loans for house repairs or maintenance, to former employees of the tobacco industry and their dependants. Home visits by arrangement. Also offers advice on benefits. Self or any referral.

ContactName.entry: Terry Sully, Welfare Officer Sheffield, Derbyshire and Nottinghamshire
